meanings.definition: Extremely large or great in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was immense, taking up the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The mountain range was immense, stretching as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent3: The immense cake towered over the table, tempting everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her immense talent in painting was evident in every stroke of her brush.
meanings.sent5: The immense waves crashed against the shore, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: Very great in degree or intensity.
meanings.sent1: The immense heat made it unbearable to stay outside for long.
meanings.sent2: The immense joy on her face was contagious, spreading to everyone around her.
meanings.sent3: His immense appetite surprised everyone as he finished his third plate of food.
meanings.sent4: The immense pressure of the situation weighed heavily on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The immense roar of the crowd filled the stadium, fueling the players with energy.
